results.title: Plant Engineer
results.description: A well-established manufacturing company in Gauteng is currently in search of a qualified and experienced Plant Engineer. results.title: Mine Rehabilitation Specialist
results.description: A mine in Gauteng is looking for a mine rehabilitation specialist to join their team. The candidate must have a BSc Hons in Environmental Management and 5 years experience in Mine rehabilitation.

We are seeking a Ferroalloys Manager. You will need a BEng/ BTech Metallurgical, and an MDP (Management Development Programme) will be highly desirable. You will need 10 years post-qualification experience.
results.title: Ferroalloys Manager

results.title: Mechanical Draughtsman
Structural Technician
results.description: A reputable consulting firm is urgently looking for a Structural Technician to commence duties in their Johannesburg office as soon as possible. Minimum requirements are a National Diploma in Civil Engineering coupled with at least 7 years post graduate experience working on Structural Projects. Structural Design experience is important.

A reputable consulting firm is currently looking for a Quantity Surveyor to commence duties on site in Bloemfontein as soon as possible. Minimum requirements are a BSc or BTech in Quantity Surveying coupled with at least 3 years post graduate experience working in a PQS firm. results.title: Quantity Surveyor
